title: Tiger Shroff to go daddy way for 'Munna Michael' song 'Ding Dang'! | Zee News
text:
Tiger Shroff to go daddy way for 'Munna Michael' song 'Ding Dang'! By Ritika Handoo | Last Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 12:47 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood hunk Tiger Shroff has a chiselled frame and is blessed with amazing dance moves. He can make anyone groove to his beats and yes no one's ever going to doubt that. 
The 'Heropanti' actor is now going to pay a tribute to his father Jackie Shroff in his next 'Munna Michael'. Tiger shared a fresh still from the song 'Ding Dang' which shows him going the daddy cool way. 
â€” Tiger Shroff (@iTIGERSHROFF) February 16, 2017 
Tiger can be seen donning red check shirt and jeans similar to what Jaggu dada wore in his debut venture Hero. He is also wearing a bandana giving it a full street smart stylish look. MUST READ
